DOC.brief_summary: Community Paramedicine @ Home ( CP @ Home ) novel community paramedicine health assessment program high user Emergency Medical Services ( EMS ) . Individuals identify active caller EMS , individual call EMS lift-assists , direct paramedic referral refer community paramedicine home visit program . The program focus in-home chronic disease management , community health service connection , EMS usage education . Aside chronic disease management , aspects program include health-related quality life , social isolation social determinant health . Participants program 3 one-on-one home visit community paramedic ultimately reduce repeat EMS call improve overall health .
DOC.criteria: 5 EMS call last 12 month intervention start date AND active caller last 1030 day OR Any call lift assist EMS past 1030 day OR Paramedic referral program ( identify paramedic usual practice ) All participant resident Hamilton , York Region , Cochrane , Windsor , Ontario . Individuals live long term care facility Individuals currently involve home visit social navigator program
